content:
# After waiting, it seems that no Copper Plates were produced from the smelting process, and my inventory remains unchanged. 
# The Stone Furnace still has 8 units of Copper Ore left to smelt.

# I will inspect the Stone Furnace again to understand its current status and why it did not produce any Copper Plates.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)  # Inspect the furnace inventory.
print(f"Stone Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Display the contents of the Stone Furnace.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Checking the current state of entities again.
